segments.text: This kitchen scene is a powder keg of potential disasters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the overflowing sink, and the water spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the incredibly unstable stool, wobbling under the boy's weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just waiting to tip backward and cause a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's obliviousness to all of this is simply astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is literally standing in a puddle, polishing a plate with such calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The combination of water, an unstable climbing surface, and distraction is terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really dread what's going to happen in the next few moments.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire situation is making me feel quite uneasy and on edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can so many risks converge in one small kitchen space?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer lack of awareness from the adult is almost difficult to comprehend.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before things go completely wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a compelling, albeit anxiety-inducing, tableau of domestic life.
segments.speaker: PAR
